e: By the sky//and the night comer
fme: By the heaven, and At-Tariq (the night-comer, i.e. the bright star)

e: And what//can make you know//what//the night comer (is)?
fm: আপনি জানেন, যে রাত্রিতে আসে সেটা কি
fme: And what will make you to know what At-Tariq (night-comer) is
(It is) the star of piercing brightness
There is no human being but has a protector over him (or her) (i.e. angels incharge of each human being guarding him, writing his good and bad deeds, etc)

e: So let see//man//from what//he is created
m: অতএব লক্ষ করা উচিৎ//মানুষের//কি থেকে//সৃষ্টি করা হয়েছে (তাকে)
fm: অতএব, মানুষের দেখা উচিত কি বস্তু থেকে সে সৃজিত হয়েছে।
fme: So let man see from what he is created

fm: সে সৃজিত হয়েছে সবেগে স্খলিত পানি থেকে।
fme: He is created from a water gushing forth

fm: এটা নির্গত হয় মেরুদন্ড ও বক্ষপাজরের মধ্য থেকে।
fme: Proceeding from between the back-bone and the ribs

fm: নিশ্চয় তিনি তাকে ফিরিয়ে নিতে সক্ষম।
fme: Verily, (Allah) is Able to bring him back (to life)
The Day when all the secrets (deeds, prayers, fasting, etc.) will be examined (as to their truth)

e: Then not//(is) for him//any//power//and not//any helper
fm: সেদিন তার কোন শক্তি থাকবে না এবং সাহায্যকারীও থাকবে না।
fme: Then will (man) have no power, nor any helper
By the sky (having rain clouds) which gives rain, again and again
And the earth which splits (with the growth of trees and plants)
Verily! This (the Quran) is the Word that separates (the truth from falsehood, and commands strict legal laws for mankind to cut the roots of evil)
And it is not a thing for amusement
Verily, they are but plotting a plot (against you O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)
And I (too) am planning a plan

e: So give respite//(to) the disbelievers//Give respite to them //little
fm: অতএব, কাফেরদেরকে অবকাশ দিন, তাদেরকে অবকাশ দিন, কিছু দিনের জন্যে।
fme: So give a respite to the disbelievers. Deal you gently with them for a while
